isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (NAVPAK) (1997) - SECTION 3.5: ELECTRONIC CONTROL SYSTEM DIAGNOSTICS, ACCELERATOR PEDAL POSITION SENSOR/IVS SWITCH (APS/IVS) - REMOTE PTO SPEED CONTROL (RPTO) - PTO IN-CAB MODE

svcproc.title: PTO IN-CAB MODE
svcproc.para: This parameter indicates how the dash Cruise Control switches are to be interpreted.

step1.para: NONE: The dash Cruise Control ON/OFF switch is ignored.
STATIONARY PRESET: The dash Cruise Control switches are to operate only in the PRESET state of operation.
STATIONARY VARIABLE: The dash Cruise Control switches are to operate in a variable state of operation.
MOBILE VARIABLE: The dash Cruise Control switches are to operate in a variable state of operation while allowing the vehicle to be mobile.
